. OS
    Linux (Ubuntu 804 or compatible OS)

. External packages
    libxml2
    libssl

. Compiler
    gcc 3.2.3 or above version .

. IDE (Optional)
    eclipse 3.3 and CDT 4.0.3 or compatible version.

. Version control
    Subversion command-line client, version 1.4.6.
    Subclipse 1.4.6 (Optional)

Prepare for development machine: Referenced steps on Ubuntu 8.04
. install libxml2-dev
     $ sudo apt-get install libxml2-dev

. install libssl-dev
     $ sudo apt-get install libssl-dev

. install subversion client
     $ sudo apt-get install subversion

. install a GUI svn client (optional)
     $ sudo apt-get install esvn

. install eclipse (optional)
     Please refer to
         http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/
     Recommend Eclipse IDE for C/C++ Developers

. install subclipse
     Please refer to 
     http://subclipse.tigris.org/install.html

Get source code
. For team members:
    $svn checkout https://ccniserver.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ccniserver --username  <your googlecode accoutn>
     When prompted, enter your generated googlecode.com password.
. For Non-members:
    $svn checkout http://ccniserver.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ ccniserver-read-only


Build source
   $cd ccniserver
   $make
